autoDown

public static void autoDown()
Moves the current piece down every time the method is called by the Timer timer.

addtoHolding

private void addtoHolding()
Switches the current piece and the holding piece. If there is no holding piece, then the current piece becomes the holding piece, and a new piece becomes the current piece.
